title: Single Pole Double Rocker Light Switches,Greencycle 2 Pack Paddle Light Switches 15 Amp,Sp Decora Switch White,120V-277V AC,On/Off Wall Switch, Residential/Commercial Grade,Home & Office,UL/CUL

product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: ✅【Optimized Version Decora Switch White】Designed for easy control of a single fixture, the Greencycle residential/commercial grade single pole on/off wall switch is a high-quality and durable option for your needs. Made with impact-resistant materials and designed to last, this switch is a great choice for anyone looking for a reliable and long-lasting switch.

✅【Sleek and Modern】Featuring a white decorator rocker design with smooth and quiet paddles, this switch is both elegant and modern. It's perfect for those who want a simple and stylish switch that's easy to use. With easy-to-control paddles, you'll never struggle to turn your lights on or off again. Plus, its slim design allows for multiple switches to be installed in the same wall plate.

✅【Safe and Reliable】Designed with a self-grounding clip for automatic connection in a properly grounded metal wall box, this switch is both safe and reliable. It has undergone rigorous quality testing and is UL listed for added peace of mind.

✅【Easy to Install】With quick push-in terminal wiring and traditional side wiring, this switch is easy to install. The quick wiring push-in terminals accept #14AWG solid copper wire only, while the side wiring terminal screws accept wire up to #12AWG copper or copper-clad wire. Plus, it features a break-off plaster ear for the best flush alignment and a shallow body that fits standard electrical boxes.

✅【Versatile】Suitable for both residential and most commercial areas that require only 15Amp switches, this switch can be installed in a 2 or 3 gang wall plate. It's perfect for repairing or replacing old or broken rocker switches in your home, bedroom, kitchen, offices, schools, stores, shops, restaurants, public facilities, and hotels. Upgrade your space with this versatile and reliable switch from Greencycle.

✅【Best for】Controlling a light fixture, appliance, or outlet from a single wall location.Standard single-pole switches, three-way switches, and four-way switches are all designed for standard 120-volt household circuits. And your choice will depend on whether you want to control a light fixture from one, two, or three or more wall locations.

customers_say: Customers find the light switch easy to install and appreciate its functionality, with one noting it works smoothly. They praise its build quality and sleek appearance, and consider it good value for money.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks just as I expected, easy to install
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I don’t know how to do handy things around the house, but this was really straightforward and easy enough for a total novice to change out. Now I want to change out the rest of the switches in my house.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Simple elegant rocker switches. Not much you can say about a light switch other than they worked and simple to install. They fit perfectly!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood switches and great value
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These worked well for replacing an old double light switch. They're attractive and a good value. I haven't purchased many of this style of paddle switch, so not sure how the build quality matches up with other options out there. The plastic feels good, though a little lighter plastic on the paddles than I would have expected -- and the click sound when switching is a bit sharper (hollow sounding?) than I would prefer (though it makes a very secure click) -- Overall, the switches look and work great -- and seem to have good quality switching mechanisms.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2025

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSleek & Reliable Double Rocker Switch
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This Greencycle double rocker switch looks great and works smoothly. It’s easy to install, well-built, and perfect for controlling two lights from one spot. A solid choice for home or office upgrades!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Came as expected timely easy to put in

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Installed easily and works as intended. I always wanted paddle switches. Affordable pricing as well.
